function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unequal impact of COVID-19 on different social classes, genders, and age groups","Impact":"Increased risk of community spread and prolonged pandemic","Mitigation":"Equitable access to healthcare, vaccination, and social support systems","Technologies":"Telemedicine, contact tracing apps, and remote work technologies","People":"Disadvantaged social classes, women, elderly, and marginalized communities","Owner":"Governments, healthcare providers, NGOs"},{"Description":"Food insecurity and famine due to lockdowns and other crises","Impact":"Worsening of food security, famine, and malnutrition","Mitigation":"Ensuring access to food, support for agricultural activities, and international aid","Technologies":"Agricultural technology, food distribution systems, and disaster relief technologies","People":"Farmers, vulnerable populations, and communities in crisis-affected areas","Owner":"International organizations, NGOs, and governments"},{"Description":"Restriction of movement for essential medical personnel and supplies","Impact":"Increased strain on healthcare systems, higher mortality rates, and delayed response to outbreaks","Mitigation":"Collaborative international agreements, waivers for medical personnel, and emergency supply chain protocols","Technologies":"Medical supply chain tracking, telehealth platforms, and emergency response technologies","People":"Medical personnel, patients, and communities at risk","Owner":"International health organizations, governments, and healthcare providers"}]}
